    2021

    Smart solutions4u recognised as 2021 award-winning top 20 Brand company in kenya

    For the last 18 years, Kenya Institute of AWARDS (KIA) has been running COYA Awards - a prestigious corporate event that recognizes organizations that have embraced Organizational Performance Index (OPI) Business Excellence framework. This recognition also incorporates SMEs (SME of the Year Awards - SMOYA) with a view to developing such enterprises to become bigger corporates as they contribute to the national economic development.
